评论详情: Love this sweatshirt! Cozy and fits well. Love the fact that it is cotton. I'm 5 ft 2 and weigh 130-135. A medium fits very well and slightly oversized. The pockets are a bonus! Highly recommend!
Super boxy, love the color but fits super weird. I’m 5ft, 120 pounds, got a size medium for more oversized.

I bought this same sweatshirt in a pink color, size medium & it fits oversized, just how I wanted it. I was very impressed with how it fit & washed, that I ordered one in black. The black one has not faired the same. I’m quit disappointed. The arms and body have shrunk.

Very comfortable.  Thicker than most sweatshirts.  Love the side pockets.  Recommended size was L.  I ordered M and it fits perfectly with oversized look.  I'm 5'7", 123 lbs.  I like the product so much I've ordered 2 more colors
Great color. Very comfortable! Nice and thick. Great length to cover your butt and front. Love the pockets!
The perfect oversized sweatshirt! Love to wear this with leggings and athletic shoes.
This is as described I do wish it was a little softer. It seems stiff to me. The color is perfect and the pockets are great. I got oversized.

I love this sweatshirt. It goes so well with leggings and the pocket are an added bonus. It's soft on the inside and seems like the outer material is good. I have only washed it once so it's good as new. I'm 5'2 and weigh 130 and it's long enough to cover my butt with room.
Love this oversized sweatshirt to wear running errands on the weekend.  Very soft and comfortable
I'm 5'3 and 165 lbs. Bought 2 of them in size large. Fits true to size. Great to wear with leggings. It's so soft, warm and comfy! I love that it has pockets!! Washes well too, did not shrink.

I tried this on and it got lint all over my black leggings. I washed and dried it on low. Got it out of the dryer and used the sticky lint roller on it. 10 sheets later I gave up. Definitely wouldn’t buy again.
Wife loved it!
Wife loves it. No other opinions matter

Oversized,warm cute sweater

Not sure why this is a frequently returned item because it is exactly like the description. It is oversized and looks so cute with leggings, it is warm, soft, and the coral orange is so vibrant. And it has pockets! Love it!
Sweatshirt is oversized and has pockets.  It is a very THICK sweatshirt!  Great for being outdoors!
Very heavy fabric. After washing neck was uncomfortably tight. Love the pockets but wish it was a softer fabric.
Super cute and a heavier weight sweatshirt…love that it has pockets! I do however wish the sleeves were just a tad bit longer. That being said I will be getting more colors!

If you like and want a huge, square, boxy sweatshirt, this is for you!  The fabric and weight are fine and as described, but the fit is awful.  It's ok for lounging at home but for wearing out of the house....nope!
I love this sweatshirt! It has pockets and is warm. It was a bit bigger than what I was expecting, but I liked that too
Fit is as expected.  Love the pockets.

评论概述: Do not shrink wrapped clothing. Too many wrinkled
评论详情: Dog hair all over ! Do not purchase!Recently ordered and sent in review as I ironed & steamed over an hour to remove all the wrinkles from being shrink wrapped. Took a chance after my review and ordered a different color. Wasn’t shrink wrapped when I received but could clearly see it had been shrink wrapped previously. Take my advice and do not purchase! STOP SHRINK WRAPPING! If you do not like to steam & iron forever do not purchase!

Nice weight for a sweatshirt.  The length is perfect to wear with leggings.  Has a slit on the sides in the bottom band and even has pockets.  Great value for the money.

I am 5’6” 125 lbs and sized up to a large to make sure it was long enough. It’s perfect! Warm fleece material, not cheap at all. So comfy! I got white and just ordered another in coffee gray!

Great shirt until you wash it. I ordered the dark green and washed in cold water and let air dry. After washing it has spots on the front that were not there before. For the price of this sweatshirt it is disappointing to have this happen.

This Oversized Sweatshirt is a cozy, versatile staple for any fall wardrobe. Its relaxed fit pairs well with leggings or jeans, while the soft fleece lining provides warmth without being too heavy. The crewneck design and tapered sleeves offer a polished look, and the practical pocket blends seamlessly into the style. With multiple color options and a true-to-size fit, it’s easy to find one that suits your taste. The material holds up well after washing, making it a low-maintenance, high-quality piece perfect for lounging, errands, or layering. Comfortable, stylish, and practical—this sweatshirt is a must-have!

Normally, I'm all for adding pockets on any piece of clothing, but the ones on this don't work.  They are too big and bulky and just make your sides look fat.  The color is gorgeous and the sweatshirt material is soft, but it just fits too strange for me to like it.
I bought this to wear on Redeye flights and then to have something cozy to wear in the hotel room. It serves this need perfectly! It’s soft quality material and the pockets are very helpful.
Fits beautifully
Loved how soft and warm this sweatshirts. I may buy another one!
No dislikes. It fits great. I first ordered it in purple, but learned my wife is in a black phase. I exchanged the purple for the black and she couldn’t be happier.

Great quality. Still looks good even after washing. Would buy again.
Love how soft and comfy this is. It does pull a little and leaves little balls if the inside fabric on my leggings. But not a big deal. Arms run a little short.

One of the best sweatshirts I hve purchased.  It is thick and cozy!  I like my sweatshirt big so I do wish I had sized up.  Still one of my favorite though !

Warm, comfy, long so cold wind doesn’t go up my back, and it has pockets!!!
I ordered this sweatshirt a size big as per reviews. It is huge! I washed on warm and dried hot, it barely shrunk. It is so comfy and has pockets so I still wear it! Great sweatshirt!!
Because the sweatshirt was bubble wrapped, the wrinkles did not come completely out even after being washed and dried. I like the color and the size, both were true to the ad description.

I bought this sweatshirt for a project and couldn’t be happier with the result!

This is a light to medium weight sweatshirt. It comes vacuum sealed so it needs to be washed to fluff it up. It’s very soft and warm. The pockets are nice and not bulky. The length is good also. I would definitely recommend!
Cute, BUT, the material pills right away. If you try this on before washing be prepared for anything underneath  to be covered in fleece pieces.
So comfortable and love the pockets. Will definitely buy another color. Bought a small and still has a little bit of room.

Quality is good. Love the fit. Not too oversized and bulky, but long enough to comfortably wear with leggings.
